Summary: White lights , about 15 white spheres and 2 red spheres and 1 red cone shaped
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching tv and I randomly went outside and played with my dog as I laided in the grown I notice 3 white spehers Ina shape of a triangle I stare for about 4 mins and 1 disappears then one of them moves away from the other and both disappeared . The in the distance 2 more appeared white spheres . And disappeared 10 min later . After about 30 seconds 4 more Ppeared .. Then disappeared in about 6 min then 2 red sphere flying in opposite directions then a red cone shaped . After about 6 more appeared randomly and disappeared they were so far my cheap camera could not focus but I have 7 witnesses who saw with me.
